name: Smeargle
description: The Painter Pokémon. Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: At the end of each long rest, this Pokémon rerolls on the nature table, replacing its nature with the result until the next long rest.
